name: R5-Location-R4-Location
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Location into FHIR R4

element.display: Details and position information for a place

target.display: Details and position information for a physical place
target.comment: R5 `Location` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location`
R5 `Location.address` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.address`

element.display: A list of alternate names that the location is known as, or was known as, in the past

target.display: A list of alternate names that the location is known as, or was known as, in the past
target.comment: R5 `Location.alias` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.alias`

element.display: Official contact details for the location

target.comment: R5 `Location.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.contained`

element.display: Additional details about the location that could be displayed as further information to identify the location beyond its name

target.display: Additional details about the location that could be displayed as further information to identify the location beyond its name
target.comment: R5 `Location.description` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Location.description` - description has change due to type change: R5 description markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 description

element.display: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the location

target.display: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the location
target.comment: R5 `Location.endpoint` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.endpoint`

R5 `Location.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Location.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: What days/times during a week is this location usually open (including exceptions)

target.display: What days/times during a week is this location usually open
target.comment: R5 `Location.hoursOfOperation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Location.hoursOfOperation` - hoursOfOperation has change due to type change: R5 hoursOfOperation Availability has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 hoursOfOperation
R5 `Location.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.id`

element.display: Unique code or number identifying the location to its users

target.display: Unique code or number identifying the location to its users
target.comment: R5 `Location.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Location.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.implicitRules`
R5 `Location.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Location.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: Organization responsible for provisioning and upkeep

target.display: Organization responsible for provisioning and upkeep
target.comment: R5 `Location.managingOrganization` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.managingOrganization`
R5 `Location.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.meta`

R5 `Location.mode` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.mode` - mode has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/location-mode|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/location-mode|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

R5 `Location.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Location.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Name of the location as used by humans

target.display: Name of the location as used by humans
target.comment: R5 `Location.name` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.name`

element.display: The operational status of the location (typically only for a bed/room)

target.display: The operational status of the location (typically only for a bed/room)
target.comment: R5 `Location.operationalStatus` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.operationalStatus`

element.display: Another Location this one is physically a part of

target.display: Another Location this one is physically a part of
target.comment: R5 `Location.partOf` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.partOf`
R5 `Location.position` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.position`
R5 `Location.position.altitude` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.position.altitude`

R5 `Location.position.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Location.position.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Location.position.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.position.id`
R5 `Location.position.latitude` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.position.latitude`
R5 `Location.position.longitude` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.position.longitude`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Location.position.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Location.position.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

R5 `Location.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/location-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/location-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Location.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.text`
R5 `Location.type` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Location.type`

element.display: Connection details of a virtual service (e.g. conference call)
